entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
